column4: Holy SMOKES! Feisty's an Upgrade Maniac! I installed 9 updates and 10 minutes later 9 more are available... :P

Here's the deal: I've got this here laptop running on a P3 processor. Now, this processor is supposed to be able to scale between two frequencies: 7xx MHz and 997MHz, but it is sticking at 997MHz in Feisty. How in the world to I get the thing unstuck? :)
I used powernowd on my debian laptop...
